items.headline: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.summary_en: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

items.headline: After 2 straight misses, this year’s ‘Santa Claus rally’ is off to a solid start. Why it matters for investors.
items.summary_en: Stocks have never seen three negative “Santa Claus rally” periods in a row. After two straight misses, history says the odds favor a comeback this year.
